text: @HillaryClinton They won't.  Children have an almost non existent, a very very low propensity of passing on COVID-19 WHICH has a proven less than 1% (in fact measured in tenths of) mortality rate.  But why let science and facts stop your fear mongering and attempts to destroy the economy 100%
